message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this amazing product with you. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm happy to offer it to you for $13000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. I think that's a more reasonable price for this product, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $12800. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $12200. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand your willingness to compromise, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as high as $12200. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $12600. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to think that we're getting close to a deal, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, so I'll offer $1250 less than your last price. I'll give you $12350 for the product. That's my final offer.
